humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This means that no metastatic carcinoma was found in the sentinel lymph nodes, which aligns with the definition of N0 (no positive lymph nodes) according to the provided rules.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report does not mention the presence of cancerous cells in any of the sentinel lymph nodes (C1, C2, D1, E1, F1). The report explicitly states 'no tumor seen' for each lymph node. Therefore, the patient's N stage is N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis).
